member.name: T:Ncqrs.Commands.Attributes.MapsToAggregateRootConstructorAttribute
member.summary: Defines that the command maps directly to a constructor on an aggregate root.

member.name: M:Ncqrs.Commands.Attributes.MapsToAggregateRootConstructorAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The full qualified name of the type of the aggregate root.
member.exception: Thrown when typeName is null or emtpy.

member.name: M:Ncqrs.Commands.Attributes.MapsToAggregateRootConstructorAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The type of the aggregate root.

member.name: P:Ncqrs.Commands.Attributes.MapsToAggregateRootConstructorAttribute.TypeName
member.summary: Get or sets the full qualified type name of the target aggregate root.

member.name: T:Ncqrs.Commands.Attributes.MapsToAggregateRootMethodAttribute
member.summary: Defines that the command maps directly to a method on an aggregate root.

member.name: M:Ncqrs.Commands.Attributes.MapsToAggregateRootMethodAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ncqrs.Commands.Attributes.MapsToAggregateRootMethodAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Ncqrs.Commands.Attributes.MapsToAggregateRootMethodAttribute.TypeName
member.summary: Get or sets the full qualified type name of the target aggregate root.

member.name: P:Ncqrs.Commands.Attributes.MapsToAggregateRootMethodAttribute.MethodName
member.summary: Get or sets the full qualified name of the target method.
member.remarks: Leave this null or empty to automap the target method based on the command name.

member.name: T:Ncqrs.Commands.Attributes.AggregateRootIdAttribute
member.summary: Marks a property as the propery that contains the aggregate root id.

member.name: T:Ncqrs.Commands.Attributes.ExcludeInMappingAttribute
member.summary: Defines that a property should be excluded in the auto mapping process.
